text: Chumakov () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Krasnogvardeyskoye Rural Settlement of Koshekhablsky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 78 as of 2018. There is 1 street. == Geography == The khutor is located on the right bank of the Belaya River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Koshekhablsky District
title: Chumakov (village)
